segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Hi, I'm Cooksey.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: And I'm Paul.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We've started something really exciting and we want you to be the first to know about it.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: It's all about creativity, helping creators to do their best work faster, better and easier.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: But first, a bit of history.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We both cut our teeth in TV and VFX and then found ourselves in the world of E learning.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: It's there a company called Circus street that we were able to collaborate, argue, bounce ideas off each other for over a decade.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: At Circuit street, our real advantage was creativity.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: While our competitors were just ticking boxes, we were building something different.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: A product driven by innovation, quality and genuine creativity.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: That's what set Us apart.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: All of that experience, insight, shared passion led us to Nice Touch.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: A new chapter dedicated entirely to empowering creators like never before.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Introducing. Nice touch.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We're calling it the operating system for Creators.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Not an actual os,

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: but a smart, intuitive set of tools

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: that streamline your existing creative processes.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: This means smoother workflows, fewer disruptions,

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: more opportunities to create amazing work,

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: leading to better projects, more gigs, and more income for creators.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We're not trying to automate creativity itself. We want to take away the mundane tasks that hold you back.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Every creator understands the frustration of losing valuable hours to repetitive tasks,

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: things like checking exports or organizing files, chasing feedback.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: We want to remove those barriers, helping you to spend more time doing what you genuinely love creating.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: So we're at the start of this journey, and we need you.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We wouldn't be where we are now if we hadn't worked with some of the most talented and amazing people. It's all about collaboration.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: So whether it's just a chat or you want to see what we're up to or get involved somehow.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Let's do it.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Go sign up on the site. It's nicetouch app.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Come chat with us on Discord. I'll put the link in the description. We're online most days,

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: and if you've got our numbers.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Just give us a call or drop us a message.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: This is just the beginning. Who knows where we'll end up? But it's going to be big.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Join us for the journey.
